original_text: He must wash his body before he puts on his special clothes. He must wear his linen robe and linen clothes next to his body. They are holy. He must tie a linen belt round his body. He must put the linen hat on his head. These clothes are holy.
korean_text: 거룩한 세마포 속옷을 입으며 세마포 속바지를 몸에 입고 세마포 띠를 띠며 세마포 관을 쓸지니 이것들은 거룩한 옷이라 물로 그의 몸을 씻고 입을 것이며

sentences.original_text: before he puts on his special clothes
He must wear his linen robe
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 아마 예복을 입어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and linen clothes next to his body
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 몸에 가까운 아마 옷을 입어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must tie a linen belt
He must put the linen hat
